desc: Learn more about Design Paks© which help theaters like yours build extravagant sets quickly and easily for 150+ musicals and plays. When leasing a Design Pak, you get the set blueprints, our how-to manual which is a clear guide to the basics, the artist's renderings, and a complete materials list. Explore our sets now!

layout.text: Lease our blueprint Design Paks© to simplify the set building process for over 150 shows!
